game.name: Color Match
game.originalPrompt: Create a simple color matching memory game

challenges: Initial CORS issues when loading game assets locally
Metadata structure mismatch causing mapping errors
Managing game state and preventing rapid clicks during animations
Ensuring proper file organization for different AI implementations
solutions: Implemented local Python HTTP server to resolve CORS
Updated metadata structure to include required fields
Added isLocked flag to prevent tile interaction during animations
Reorganized files to properly attribute Claude implementation
learnings: Local development requires proper server setup for file access
Importance of consistent metadata structure across implementations
CSS Grid and transitions provide smooth game experience
Proper error handling improves development workflow

minimumRequirements.browser: Any modern browser with CSS Grid support

notes: Initially misattributed to GPT-4, corrected to Claude Sonnet 3.5
Development process included fixing CORS and metadata issues
Game features smooth animations and responsive design
Implementation uses vanilla JavaScript for simplicity
Local development setup requires HTTP server for proper functionality
